cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 5, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7312, a bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds to support or facilitate the participation of the Russian Federation in the Group of Seven, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 57 (Thursday, March 31, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KEATING:
H.R. 7312.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H4073]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: To prohibit the use of Federal funds to support or facilitate the participation of the Russian Federation in the Group of Seven, and for other purposes.
